alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 03 at 1:22PM CDT until August 04 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Flooding possible over portions of southwestern Nebraska tonight... .Heavy rain fell over Hayes and Frontier counties over the past couple of nights. Another round of heavy rain is possible once again tonight and could lead to flooding or flash flooding in these counties. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Flood Watch for a portion of southwest Nebraska, including the following areas, Frontier and Hayes. * From 7 PM CDT this evening through 10 AM CDT Friday morning * Heavy rain fell across Hayes and Frontier counties over the past couple of nights with 3 to 5 inches being reported. Another 1 to 2 inches of rainfall is possible tonight in these areas and could lead to flooding or flash flooding.
info.instruction: A Flood Watch means there is a potential for flooding or flash flooding based on current forecasts. You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
